sentences.en: "He speaks English," she said to Graham. "I gathered that."
sentences.cn: “他会说英语，”她对格雷厄姆说，“我料到了。”

sentences.en: "What a pity," Graham said with a hint of sarcasm.
sentences.cn: “太遗憾了，”格雷厄姆略带挖苦地说道。

sentences.en: Are you a gambling man, Mr Graham?
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆先生,你是好赌的人吗?

sentences.en: Graham attempted to quash rumours of growing discontent.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆试图平息有关不满情绪日益强烈的流言。

sentences.en: Graham Bell was the father of telephone.
sentences.cn: 格雷汉姆·贝尔是电话的发明人.

sentences.en: Graham hit him across the face with the gun.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆用枪击打他的脸部。
格雷厄姆能持之以恒，始终如一。

sentences.en: Graham made a quick mental calculation.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆很快就心算出来了。

sentences.en: Graham put the van in neutral and jumped out into the road.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆把货车挂到空挡，自己跳到马路上。

sentences.en: Graham sat aft , looking steadily out to the horizon.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆坐在船尾, 凝望着地平线.

sentences.en: Graham was already at the door.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆已经在门口了。

sentences.en: Graham was right to condemn his players for lack of ability, attitude and application.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆指责队员们技艺不佳、态度不端正而且不够努力，他说得没错。

sentences.en: The play is based upon a novel by Graham Greene.
sentences.cn: 这个剧是根据格雷厄姆·格林的一本小说改编的.

sentences.en: The waiter returned with their order and Graham signed the bill.
sentences.cn: 侍者把他们点的餐端了过来，格雷厄姆签了单。

sentences.en: Whitlock silently cursed Graham for heaping more suspicion on him.
sentences.cn: 惠特洛克心里默默地诅咒格雷厄姆，因为他让自己备受猜疑。

words.tran_cn: 全麦的；粗面粉的；全麦粉制成的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔（电话发明者）
